Name: Lost
About the game: The last knight of an army aims to avenge his homeland and to destroy all his enemies by himself. Lost is a very short game but with a relatively high game difficulty. Are you able to defeat the enemy? Features: ■ Beautiful 2D atmosphere! ■ Different enemies with different weapons! ■ Very beautiful music! ■ Excellent gameplay!
